 Fix an assertion failure in ha_innobase.cc about line 302 when a user has used user level locks and closes a connection; this was reported by Jeremy Zawodny

all diffs diff -Nur style patch Bookmarkable link 
 
 A small fix for HP-UX when used --with-debug

history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed a problem with --skip-networking. 
 
 This fix should be merged into 4.0 and 4.1

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
all diffs diff -Nur style patch Bookmarkable link 
 
 Bump up version number to 3.23.52 in configure.in since version 3.23.51 
 has finally been released 
 
 configure.in@1.180 2002-06-17 11:40:53+02:00 lenz@mysql.com 
 history annotate diffs 
 
 Bump up version number to 3.23.52 now that 3.23.51 is finally out
